post.text: Why do Trump and Putin keep saying all the same things?

comment.author: Andrew
comment.text: Because DT has been recruited by Putin as an agent for Russia. An unwilling agent which means that he is too dumb to realize that he is working for the enemy. He is not even getting paid

replies.author: Trevor
replies.text: Ashley Weaver HAHAHA~ I know... They truly are~ Keeps us all laughing~

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: we definitely are going to need the 2nd amendment if DT becomes president so we can take back our country once he turns it to a police state that is run by Putin and his old KGB. Is that stupid enough for you.
